channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- DiskStation Manager (DSM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- DiskStation Manager (DSM)

item.title: CVE-2022-27623|2024-08-03T05:33:00.648Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Missing authentication for critical function vulnerability in iSCSI management functionality in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 7.1-42661 allows remote attackers to read or write arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27622|2024-08-03T05:32:59.979Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Package Center functionality in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 7.1-42661 allows remote authenticated users to access intranet resources via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27626|2024-08-03T05:32:59.212Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: A vulnerability regarding concurrent execution using shared resource with improper synchronization ('Race Condition') is found in the session processing functionality of Out-of-Band (OOB) Management. This allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) versions before 7.1.1-42962-2 may be affected: DS3622xs+, FS3410, and HD6500.

item.title: CVE-2022-3576|2024-08-03T01:14:02.548Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: A vulnerability regarding out-of-bounds read is found in the session processing functionality of Out-of-Band (OOB) Management. This allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) versions before 7.1.1-42962-2 may be affected: DS3622xs+, FS3410, and HD6500.

item.title: CVE-2022-27616|2024-08-03T05:33:00.475Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 7.0.1-42218-3 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27624|2024-08-03T05:32:59.875Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: A vulnerability regarding improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer is found in the packet decryption functionality of Out-of-Band (OOB) Management. This allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) versions before 7.1.1-42962-2 may be affected: DS3622xs+, FS3410, and HD6500.

item.title: CVE-2022-27625|2024-08-03T05:32:59.822Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: A vulnerability regarding improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer is found in the message processing functionality of Out-of-Band (OOB) Management. This allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) versions before 7.1.1-42962-2 may be affected: DS3622xs+, FS3410, and HD6500.

item.title: CVE-2022-22684|2024-08-03T03:21:48.988Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability in task management component in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.4-25553 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-22688|2024-08-03T03:21:48.973Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in a command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in File service functionality in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.4-25556-2 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-22680|2024-08-03T03:21:48.840Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Exposure of sensitive information to an unauthorized actor vulnerability in Web Server in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 7.0.1-42218-2 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-22679|2024-08-03T03:21:48.985Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in support service management in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 7.0.1-42218-2 allows remote authenticated users to write arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-22687|2024-08-03T03:21:49.112Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Buffer copy without checking size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in Authentication functionality in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.3-25426-3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27610|2024-08-03T05:32:59.274Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.3-25423 allows remote authenticated users to delete arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.
